caption: The owner is very nice.  I love the waffles, they're light airy, and the whipped cream is not too sweet.  She honestly makes the best waffles I've had on the island.

The aunty at the counter is super nice and attentive. Waffles are REALLY tasty, and the flavor selection and drink selections are pretty good too! I had the guava waffles (but definitely plan to come back and try the others). It’s really just whipped cream with guava sauce, but the waffles are delectably light and crispy, and the whipped cream doesn’t make it dense at all! They are perfectly sweet. Very cute and yummy light breakfast/snack place 💖

My new favorite casual treat in town! I had the cheesecake waffle with bananas and a cappuccino. Not only was the waffle perfectly crisp on the outside and soft on the inside, but the cappuccino was delicious!! My husband had the maple cinnamon waffle and OH MY GOODNESS it was mouthwatering!!! His vanilla latte was also just the right amount of sweet. The owner, Ms. Anna, and her daughter Kapua are so sweet and really make the experience great. Overall, I can’t recommend this place enough. Great for a casual coffee date or a unique treat to end date night. So many flavors to choose from including Lilikoi, lots of fruits, peanut butter, chocolate, and so much more! Go get some waffles!!
